parsed_json.name: Pushups
parsed_json.summary: A bodyweight exercise that uses a lot of muscles at the same time.

steps.step: Tilt your pelvis backward and keep your butt squeezed tight.
Place your wrist in a nearly vertical line under your shoulder when you do the standard pushup.
Go all the way up and all the way down and let your body straight.
When you are going down your shoulder blades come together and when you are going up they go apart.
